name: Sync Web Application
description: Sample web application using Twilio Sync.

ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio accountSid. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

SYNC_SERVICE_SID.description: Sync service SID. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/sync/dashboard

API_KEY.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/sync/runtime/api-keys

API_KEY_SECRET.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API.
